name: Restrained
content: You’re tied up and can barely move, or a creature has you pinned. You have the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} conditions, and you can’t use any actions with the attack or manipulate traits except to attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SjmKHgI7a5Z9JzBx]{Force Open} your bonds. Restrained overrides @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}.
